channel.title: Immortals Hell: Alpha Testing
channel.description:
[center][center][size=12pt][b]The Original Thread [/b][/size][/center] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/398759-immortals-hell-you-friend-foe.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/398759-immortals-hell-you-friend-foe.html[/url]
Alpha stage of Immortals Hell is Pure bug testing. The Home has everything for you guys to test besides fishing. We need players to play the game and help us find any bugs so that we can improve the game! Exp have been increased so that its not hard to level.
Forums: [URL=http://"http://www.zxproductions.org/home/"]Home[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.zxproductions.org/home/webclient.html"]Webclient[/URL]
[LEFT]Q: What Do we get for testing/helping in Alpha stage? A: You get a prize for real release ("Easter Ring") which is all for looks but it shows you helped us and player in the future maybe jealous
Q: Why are you hosting this alpha instead of coding the bug fixes? A: We need people to help us find the bug fixes because its hard to find every single little bug with a staff team all of 3 people
Q: Will our accounts be reset? A: Yes, But like i said you will get a Easter ring in the real Release so its not just for nothing
Q: Will all skills be available? A: Yes and No some are still being coded but all the main skills will be out in the open spread out in the GE for testing.
Q: Can We donate during alpha A: No, We strongly believe all alpha/beta testing should be free and open to the people
[/LEFT]
[center][b][size=12pt]Pictures[/size][/b][/center] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2FkfG.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2Fkiy.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2FkkX.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2FkmL.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2FknW.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2Fkt2.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Immortals Hell: Alpha Testing
item.dc:creator: @knightlord knightlord
item.description:
@knightlord wrote:

Soulcist:

So… what’s the base considering you have everything stuck-in at home?

This is project perfection base, and everything is at home because this is an alpha test, we just want to find bugs.

3lv3n snip3r:

What’s up with the first few pictures objects? It looks like you’re using the wrong flo.dat.

I know the flo.dat is messed up, but I think it looks like that because the client is loading some 634 data. 317 clients weren’t made for this sort of stuff.

nolan2131:

So Chase Foster, what made you and Drenkai get back into it?

I am Drenkai, and I never left the project, we just weren’t developing it for a while because of school and other factors.

Read full topic

item.title: Immortals Hell: Alpha Testing
item.dc:creator: @knightlord knightlord
item.description:
@knightlord wrote:

[center][center][size=12pt]The Original Thread
[/size][/center]
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/398759-immortals-hell-you-friend-foe.html

Alpha stage of Immortals Hell is Pure bug testing. The Home has everything for you guys to test besides fishing. We need players to play the game and help us find any bugs so that we can improve the game! Exp have been increased so that its not hard to level.

Forums:
Home
Webclient

[LEFT]Q: What Do we get for testing/helping in Alpha stage?
A: You get a prize for real release (“Easter Ring”) which is all for looks but it shows you helped us and player in the future maybe jealous

Q: Why are you hosting this alpha instead of coding the bug fixes?
A: We need people to help us find the bug fixes because its hard to find every single little bug with a staff team all of 3 people

Q: Will our accounts be reset?
A: Yes, But like i said you will get a Easter ring in the real Release so its not just for nothing

Q: Will all skills be available?
A: Yes and No some are still being coded but all the main skills will be out in the open spread out in the GE for testing.

Q: Can We donate during alpha
A: No, We strongly believe all alpha/beta testing should be free and open to the people

[/LEFT]

[center][size=12pt]Pictures[/size][/center]





[/center]

Read full topic
